verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> and to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> by his own standard, <S%H1714><s%> with the banners <S%H226><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses: <S%H1004><s%> at a distance <S%H5048><s%> from the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall they encamp <S%H2583><s%> around it. <S%H5439><s%>"

Those who encamp <S%H2583><s%> on the east side <S%H6924><s%> toward the sunrise <S%H4217><s%> shall be of the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> according to their divisions: <S%H6635><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall be Nahshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab. <S%H5992><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H7657><s%> were seventy-four thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

Those who encamp <S%H2583><s%> next to him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Issachar: <S%H3485><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> shall be Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar. <S%H6686><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of it, <S%H2572><s%> were fifty - four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Zebulun: <S%H2074><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> shall be Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon. <S%H2497><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of it, <S%H2572><s%> were fifty - seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

All who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were one hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> - six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H6635><s%> They shall set out <S%H5265><s%> first. <S%H7223><s%>

"On the south side <S%H8486><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H6635><s%> The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> shall be Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur. <S%H7707><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of it, <S%H705><s%> were forty - six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"Those who encamp <S%H2583><s%> next to him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Simeon. <S%H8095><s%> The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> shall be Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai. <S%H6701><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H2572><s%> were fifty - nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad: <S%H1410><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> shall be Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel. <S%H7467><s%>

His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H705><s%> were forty - five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

"All who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> were one <S%H259><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> - one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty, <S%H2572><s%> according to their armies. <S%H6635><s%> They shall set out <S%H5265><s%> second. <S%H8145><s%>

"Then the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall set out, <S%H5265><s%> with the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the camps. <S%H4264><s%> As they encamp, <S%H2583><s%> so shall they set out, <S%H5265><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his place, <S%H3027><s%> by their standards. <S%H1714><s%>

"On the west side <S%H3220><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their divisions: <S%H6635><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> shall be Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud. <S%H5989><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H705><s%> were forty thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"Next to him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> shall be Gamaliel <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur. <S%H6301><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H7970><s%> were thirty - two thousand <S%H505><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall be Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gideoni. <S%H1441><s%>
His army, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H7970><s%> were thirty - five <S%H2568><s%> thirty-five <S%H505><s%> thousand four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"All who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> were one hundred <S%H3967><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> one hundred, <S%H3967><s%> according to their divisions. <S%H6635><s%> They shall set <S%H5265><s%> out third. <S%H7992><s%>

"On the north side <S%H6828><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their divisions: <S%H6635><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai. <S%H5996><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H8346><s%> were sixty - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"Those who encamp <S%H2583><s%> next to him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher: <S%H836><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> shall be Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ochran. <S%H5918><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H705><s%> were forty - one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%> and the prince <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> shall be Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan. <S%H5881><s%>
His division, <S%H6635><s%> and those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H2572><s%> were fifty - three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

"All who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> were one hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> - seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%> They shall set <S%H5265><s%> out last <S%H314><s%> by their standards. <S%H1714><s%>"

These are those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses. <S%H1004><s%> All who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the camps <S%H4264><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifty. <S%H2572><s%>

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Thus the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did. <S%H6213><s%> According to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so they encamped <S%H2583><s%> by their standards, <S%H1714><s%> and so they set out, <S%H5265><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> by their families, <S%H4940><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses. <S%H1004><s%>
